starrating module¶

Module implementing star rating widget.

class starrating.StarRating(parent, image_path='images', initial_rating=0, readonly=False)[source]¶

Bases: CTkFrame

Widget enabling rating from 0.5 to 5 stars. Inherits from customtkinter.CTkFrame.

Parameters:

  • parent (customtkinter.CTkBaseClass) – Parent widget.

  • image_path (str) – Path to the directory with star images.

  • initial_rating (float) – Initial rating value.

  • on_rating_change (callable or None) – Callback called when rating changes.

build_ui()[source]¶

Builds the user interface of the widget.

get_rating()[source]¶

Returns the current rating.

Returns:

Current rating value.

Return type:

float

set_rating(rating)[source]¶

Sets the rating and updates star appearance.

Parameters:

rating (float) – New rating (0.5-5.0).

letterboxd_clone
